attributes.action: stop private companies running Airport Security
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Have a homeland airport security control authority to ensure a consistant standard of security at all UK airports - ensuring staff are paid an appropriate salary and prevent airports making profits from airport security charges. In an age of increased threat airports across the UK are still driving costs of security down, reducing staffing levels and standards of service. This needs addressing now!
